posts.postText: I think we should give him admin back. Or at least mod. You guys?
He would most likely decline both.

He JUST got here and has a history of trololing.

If I was someone such as NinjaBreadMan or one of our regulars who isn't really acknowledged, I'd be pissed as a vegetarian in a butcher shop if he got it back. It clearly would show favoritism and would upset some of our regulars.

I vote no, not because he doesn't deserve it, but he was gone for a while, and just got back, I think he could possibly still make a good one, but he stepped down, on his own, and left. Also, like Kryzoid said, he would probably decline.


I agree with Dum, too, he brings up a good point, about regulars LIKE Ninja Breadman who have been with us for a long time, but never was brought up in mod discussions.
Besides my whole list of people that could be promoted but everyone was like "No because I dont like them" to.
He asked me if he could have it back but instead of just giving it back I decided to ask you guys.
It's too soon. He has to prove himself again that he's here to stay and not trolling.
